summary: When barrio leader Henry Reyna and his friends are unjustly convicted on circumstantial evidence, activist lawyers Alice Bloomfield and George Shearer fight the blatant racially motivated miscarriage of justice to win them their freedom.
cast: Daniel Valdez|Edward James Olmos|Charles Aidman|Tyne Daly|John Anderson|Abel Franco|Mike Gomez|Alma Martinez|Francis X. McCarthy|Lupe Ontiveros|Ed Peck|Robert Phalen|Tony Plana|Rose Portillo|Marco Rodríguez|Kelly Ward|Helena Andreyko|Bob Basso|Darlene Bryan|Bernadette Colognne|Miguel Delgado|Roberta Delgado|Anacani Echeverria|Hammam Shafie|Honey Garcia|James Hogan|Laura Leyva|Sal Lopez|Luis Manuel|Kim Miyori|Ángela Moya|Bertha E. Oropeza|Jeff Reynolds|Juan Ríos|Greg Rosatti|Nancy Salis|Candice L. Silva|Geno Silva|Kurtwood Smith|Dennis Stewart|Duke Stroud|Judy Susman|Jon Thomas|Lewis Whitlock|Antoinette Yuskis|Robert Beltran|Alma Beltran|Julio Medina|Diane Rodriguez|Socorro Valdez|Michael Santiago
title: Fiebre latina
